archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.3.8a: a) mobilising a full incident response team, either by convening an ad hoc team or notifying the permanent, full-time Computer Security Incident Response Team (CSIRT), supported by relevant subject-matter experts and business representatives
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
